summary: This bill, the Family-to-Family Reauthorization Act of 2025, proposes to amend Title V of the Social Security Act to extend funding for family-to-family health information centers. The bill allocates specific funding amounts: $6,000,000 for the period from April 1, 2025, to September 30, 2025, and $9,000,000 for each fiscal year from 2026 to 2029.
